Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/ani: I think I'm going to decide which animal it is after I'm done.
I'm working on something new, but the way it's going...
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/ann: Everything I know about whittling, I learned by making myself a nuisance to Landen when I was a kid!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/bat: A bath was just the thing!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/bee: You know, I told Luc that bees can fly in the rain because of their yellow jackets.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/bre: You look tired, [Ari]... take a break, have a bite to eat. No one would accuse you of loafing around.
Nora was going to skip breakfast, but I talked her out of it. It's true what they say... breakfast is butter together!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/buy: Crunch crunch... oh, [Ari]! You didn't see me eating on the job, okay? I have to destroy the evidence! CRUNCH CRUNCH CRUNCH!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/car: I had a great weekend! Finally carved out some time to do some whittling!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/cel: It's a quick way of Celine my fate.
I try not to make dad jokes when my eldest is around.
Hope Celine's settling into her cottage alright.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/cof: Coffee's got it tough at our place. Imagine getting mugged every morning!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/del: Reminds me of Nora at her age.
Dell would rather be out adventuring than making her bed.
How can Dell possibly be so muddy this early in the day? I'm honestly a little impressed.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/din: Nora likes savory, Dell likes sweet, and Celine likes her veggies... dinner is a real free-for-all at our place.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/dow: What a beautiful day! I wonder if anyone's down by the beach.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/ear: Finally, my favorite season has arrived! It's a Winter Pun-derland!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/fal: You know, I'm supposed to be doing chores out here, and I am, but mostly I'm enjoying the weather. It's beauti-fall out here!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/fee: After spending all day on my feet, it's nice to take a load off! There's always an open seat at the Sleeping Dragon.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/gou: How's that fall weather treating you? Having a gourd day?
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/gre: Nice to meet you, [Ari], I'm Holt. I'd been wondering who'd moo-ve into that old farm.
I'm peas-ed to meet you too, Holt!
What's the matter? It be-hooves you to respond to a pun in kind, you know.
Don't worry, I'll help you practice. You'll get the hang of it!
Anywho, my wife Nora and I run the $General Store$. Our girls, Celine and Dell, help out as well. Stop by if you ever need supplies!
Well hello there. You must be the new face in town!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/her: Let me know if there's anything I can help you with, [Ari]!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/hit: Time to make like a pitchfork and hit the hay!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/hur: I try to keep the house tidy, but it's hard when Hurricane Dell tears through every night. Haha!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/inn: It just smells so good in here!
I always drop by to say good morning and end up staying for a bite.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/jo_: When the Inn gets real crowded, sometimes Jo and Hemlock will croon for the guests.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/kid: Sounds like the kids had a lot of fun at the beach today. Have you been out there, [Ari]? Summer's the season for it.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/lan: That project kept him busy for months.
Fun fact: Landen built all the shelving and display cases in here!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/lov: When I do it, it doesn't make any cents!
I love my job. I tried doing what Nora does, but she's the one with the head for accounting.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/mis: It's been quieter since Celine moved out, but Dell makes enough mess for both of them.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/nic: We got some nice stuff in this week, [Ari]! Have a look!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/nor: Phew... Nora's always up so early. I dawn get it.
Turned out she secretly liked me... don't tell her, but I think it's pretty cute.
Y'know, Nora used to pick on me when we were kids.
Shh, Nora's got her head in the numbers.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/pro: Our fall produce is looking pretty good, [Ari]. Have yourself a look!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/pun: Getting an early start too, [Ari]? You know what they say about early risers, right? If not, I'll wait for it to dawn on you!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/qui: Think I heard Dell conk out, we'd better keep it down out here... haha.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/rec: Do you want to hear a joke about receipts?
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/reg: Hey [Ari]! I'm holding down the fort today. What can I get for you?
We got fruits, we got vegetables, we got seeds, what else could you need?
It's [Ari], my favorite customer! Take your time, look around, let me know if you need something!
Are you looking for cabbage? Turnips? Let me know if I can produce anything for you.
A little grocery tip: if you're buying cabbages, two heads are better than one.
Let me know if I can help you find anything, [Ari].
Don't mind me, I'm just getting the till in order. Let me know if I can help with something!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/rei: The Inn is always bustling on rainy days, so Reina comes in early to stock up for the evening rush at the Inn!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/rel: Relieved of duty! Nora's got the till, if you need anything.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/she: Because if we didn't, we'd be ashamed of ourshelves.
Do you know why we keep the store so clean?
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/sho: Every farmer needs a shovel, eh [Ari]?
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/sno: Between you and me, it takes every bit of my willpower not to start a snowball fight.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/sou: The best thing about the Sleeping Dragon is that the soup's always on!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/spo: I keep trying to tell Hayden, he shouldn't pamper his cows too much.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/spr: I'm not much for summer, fall and winter cleaning either!
I can't say I'm much for spring cleaning.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/ste: Nora brought some stew back from the Inn... that family is too kind to us!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/sto: Nora gave me a hard time about overstocking the shelves the other day. I told her aisle weight for an explanation.
Stocking up for the storm, [Ari]? I bet the Inn'll be real crowded tonight if you're looking for heaping helpings and cozy company!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/swe: Fall is a wonderful time of year, because I get to break out the ol' sweater vest!
It's like I was maid for her!
I take care of cleaning while Nora manages the general store.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/thy: Best way to wake up on thyme.
I always tell Celine that if she's having trouble sleeping, she ought to take a nap in her garden.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/tid: A tidy shop is a happy shop!
She'd fall asleep in the middle of potting her sprouts and use a sack of potting soil as a pillow. Dirt all over the carpets!
I'm tidying up while I can! Dell's the messiest now, but when Celine was little she was twice the menace Dell is.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/tir: A good day of cleaning always makes me feel wiped out.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/tra: Wonder if Landen's around... I want to up my carving technique, and he's the expert.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/wee: Thought about it myself, but I live too much by the seed of my plants.
You know [Ari], I admire that you've taken over the old farm...
I'm the one in town who's known for being corny!
I know you're the new farmer and all, but don't get jealous...
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/wel: It's not easy keeping the town well-stocked! But Nora gets the best for Mistria.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/wha: I wonder what soup they've got going over at the inn.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/whi: Now, on the topic of animals... what's Dell's newest favorite? Alpaca? Capybara?
It's so relaxing to get a bit of wood and whittle away!
I like to sneak some whittling in when I can... I've been working on forest animals lately.
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Banked Lines/win: Business keeps up in the winter, too. Mistria's a busy town!
And I tell you, it's snow joke!
It's my job to get the ice off of the general store's windows!
